channel.title: Hosting 2 servers
channel.description:
How can i host 2 servers ?
A 317 and a 508 .
I find out you need to change the ports but in 508 idk how to change the port from 43594 to ... 43595 .
I whana when ppl connects on my 508 server to add at ip adress something like this : 127.0.0.1:43595 and connect . :D
I know is more easy if i change the 317 port to 43595 and let the 508 with 43594 :D , but i cant change it because i have over 20-30 players on and i cant put everyone to download the new client to play :D
that's all Thanks
--------------------------- Edite:
If you know another method ... just reply to me [br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 28, 2009, 04:03:24 pm[/size][hr]Can sombody help ?

item.title: Hosting 2 servers
item.dc:creator: @wonderspring wonderspring
item.description:
@wonderspring wrote:

How can i host 2 servers ?

A 317 and a 508 .

I find out you need to change the ports but in 508 idk how to change the port from 43594 to … 43595 .

I whana when ppl connects on my 508 server to add at ip adress something like this : 127.0.0.1:43595 and connect .

I know is more easy if i change the 317 port to 43595 and let the 508 with 43594 , but i cant change it because i have over 20-30 players on and i cant put everyone to download the new client to play

that’s all Thanks
